segments.text: Are you new here ? I come to this coffeehouse often . But I didn't see you here before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I started this part-time job just three days ago . And my internship will last 1 week . I'm still a student now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you mind if I ask you why you've taken the part-time job here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course not . You know , there are many foreign customers like you here . And I think it's good for me to improve my oral English .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , are you an English student ? Or you just study English for interest's sake ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I'm not an English student . But I do like English . I'm going to be a volunteer in the 2008 Olympics where I want to be helpful with the language . So I try to improve my English .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very nice . Thank you for your time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , sir . But I'm not allowed to accept any tips .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK then . I don't want to put you in trouble .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , would you like something else ? The new-made cafe parfait is really good . Want some ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . But I'd like some cookies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . If you want more coffee , please go over there . There is self-help coffee maker .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I surely know that . Don't forget that I am a regular customer here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oops . Well , wait for a while . We'll get it done quickly .
segments.speaker: S1
